Detailed Description

and item data contains the color definition for a context

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

kateItemData::kateItemData (  bool  def  ) 
 

constructor for emppty definitions

Parameters:
def use a default color?
If def is true a default color (black on white) will be used for this item data.

Member Function Documentation

bool kateItemData::load (  QDomNode  node  ) 
 

Load the color definition from XML.

Parameters:
node a DomNode to load the information frmo
Returns:
true if succesfull
This function will create the item data from values found on the XML.

See also:
kateItemDataManager::load(QDomDocument)

QTextCharFormat kateItemData::toCharFormat (   ) 
 

get a QTextCharFormat from this object

Returns:
a well constructed QTextCharFormat which corresponds to this object
When applying the item-data to a QTextDocument, it is needed to convert the item-data into a valid QTextCharFormat.
